# Agent Resources

> A package manager for AI coding tools. The npm/pip equivalent for AI agents.

## What This Is

Agent Resources (agr) is a CLI tool that lets developers share and install skills, commands, and sub-agents across multiple AI coding platforms with a single command. It works with Claude Code, Cursor, Codex, GitHub Copilot, and OpenCode.

## Quick Start

```bash
pip install agr
agr install username/skill-name
```

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/) - Overview and quick start guide
- [Resource Types](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/what-is-agent-resources/) - Skills, commands, subagents, and packages explained
- [Installation Guide](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/install-agent-resources/) - How to install the CLI
- [Create Your Own Repo](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/create-your-own-repo/) - Share your own resources
- [How Packaging Works](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/how-packaging-works/) - Technical details on resource structure
- [SDK Documentation](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/agent-resources-sdk/) - Python SDK for programmatic access
- [Supported Platforms](https://kasperjunge.github.io/agent-resources/site/supported-platforms/) - Claude Code, Cursor, Codex, Copilot, OpenCode

## Resource Types

| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Skills | Capabilities your agent uses automatically (like expertise in specific domains) |
| Commands | Slash commands like `/review` or `/deploy` |
| Subagents | Specialized agents to delegate tasks to |
| Packages | Bundles of skills, commands, and agents |

## Common Commands

```bash
# Install from GitHub
agr install username/packagename

# Install to a specific tool
agr install username/packagename --tool=cursor

# Install globally (all projects)
agr install username/packagename --global

# Scaffold a new repo
agr init repo agent-resources
```
